TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit UdpStatistics extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides User Datagram Protocol (UDP) statistical data.

span.span: Provides User Datagram Protocol (UDP) statistical data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的執行個體所傳回和方法，以提供應用程式存取權給 UDP 流量的資訊。Instances of this class are returned by the and methods to give applications access to UDP traffic information. 這個類別中的資訊與相互關聯中所述的管理資訊物件[ https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2013.txt ](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2013.txt)。The information in this class correlates to the management information objects described in [https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2013.txt](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2013.txt). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示指定的位址系列的 UDP 統計資料。The following code example displays the UDP statistics for the specified address family. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#3)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以呼叫這個建構函式只能由衍生自的。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DatagramsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long DatagramsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received.

span.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received.

value.span: 值，指定傳遞至使用者 UDP 資料包的總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of datagrams that were delivered to UDP users.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的數字不包含已收到但無法傳遞的資料包。The number returned by this property does not include datagrams that were received but not deliverable. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示指定的位址系列的 UDP 統計資料。The following code example displays the UDP statistics for the specified address family. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DatagramsSent As Long
public: abstract property long DatagramsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were sent.

span.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were sent.

value.span: 值，指定已傳送的資料包的總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of datagrams that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示指定的網際網路通訊協定版本的 UDP 統計資料。The following code example displays the UDP statistics for the specified Internet Protocol version. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IncomingDatagramsDiscarded As Long
public: abstract property long IncomingDatagramsDiscarded { long get(); };

summary.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received and discarded because of port errors.

span.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received and discarded because of port errors.

value.span: 值，指定的總數收到已被丟棄，因為目的地連接埠上沒有任何接聽應用程式的 UDP 資料包。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of received UDP datagrams that were discarded because there was no listening application at the destination port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要尋找的無法傳送的資料包總數，將這個屬性所傳回的值和屬性。To find the total number of datagrams that could not be delivered, add the values that were returned by this property and the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示指定的網際網路通訊協定版本的 UDP 統計資料。The following code example displays the UDP statistics for the specified Internet Protocol version. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IncomingDatagramsWithErrors As Long
public: abstract property long IncomingDatagramsWithErrors { long get(); };

summary.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received and discarded because of errors other than bad port information.

span.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received and discarded because of errors other than bad port information.

value.span: 值，指定的總數接收到缺少的目的地連接埠的應用程式以外的原因而無法傳送的 UDP 資料包。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of received UDP datagrams that could not be delivered for reasons other than the lack of an application at the destination port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要尋找的無法傳送的資料包總數，將這個屬性所傳回的值和屬性。To find the total number of datagrams that could not be delivered, add the values that were returned by this property and the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示指定的網際網路通訊協定版本的 UDP 統計資料。The following code example displays the UDP statistics for the specified Internet Protocol version. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property UdpListeners As Integer
public: abstract property int UdpListeners { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the number of local endpoints that are listening for User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams.

span.span: Gets the number of local endpoints that are listening for User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams.

value.span: 值，指定正在接聽的 UDP 資料包通訊端的總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of sockets that are listening for UDP datagrams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用和類別來建立 UDP 接聽程式的應用程式。You can use the and classes to create UDP listener applications. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示指定的網際網路通訊協定版本的 UDP 統計資料。The following code example displays the UDP statistics for the specified Internet Protocol version.
